nodes.text: Peter Townley is an actor and the former co-host for The Star Wars Show alongside Andi Gutierrez. In January 2017, Peter was replaced by Anthony Carboni. It was said he would appear periodically as a guest, though this didn't happen until the show's 100th episode in June 2018. He also hosted an Unsolved Mysteries parody for the show's 150th episode, and appeared in skits for the February 26, 2020 episode and the October 2020 "Halloween Spectacular."

Townley was also the host for The Star Wars After Show and Rogue One: A Star Wars Story - World Premiere. He has acted in several other television productions including Merritt Squad, Gold Mountain, and Daymare.
